scripts.build: for name in index index-story-search; do bun build ${name}.ts --entry-naming ${name}.mjs --target node --sourcemap=linked --outdir dist || exit 1; done && for file in scripts/*.ts; do bun build $file --entry-naming scripts/[name].mjs --target node --sourcemap=linked --outdir dist || exit 1; done && pnpm sentry:sourcemaps
scripts.dev: docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml up -d && docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml logs -f --since 1h
scripts.dev:bun: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n index,story-search "bun --inspect run index.ts" "bun --inspect run index-story-search.ts"
scripts.prod:deploy: DIR=packages/api SERVICES='api api-websocket api-story-search' pnpm -F '~ci' prod:docker-compose-up
scripts.prod:docker-compose-run-create-issues-fr: DIR=packages/api COMMAND="exec api-websocket node ./scripts/create-issues-from-subscriptions.mjs" pnpm -F '~ci' prod:docker-compose-command
scripts.prod:build-docker: REPO_NAME=ghcr.io/bperel/ducksmanager-api:websocket pnpm -F '~ci' prod:build-docker --target api -f packages/api/Dockerfile & REPO_NAME=ghcr.io/bperel/ducksmanager-api:story-search pnpm -F '~ci' prod:build-docker --target api-story-search -f packages/api/Dockerfile
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: sentry-cli sourcemaps inject --org bruno-perel --project dm-api ./dist && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org bruno-perel --project dm-api ./dist
